description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents Jesus "Aguaje" Ramos and His Buena Vista Orchestra performing live in the KEXP studio. Recorded September 3, 2024.

Songs:
El Cuarto de Tula 01:07
Bemba Colorá 07:50
Santa Lucía 13:20
Candela 19:15

Jesus “Aguaje” Ramos - Trombone, Vocals 
Lorena Ramos Diaz - Trombone, Vocals 
Amaury Tamayo - Trumpet, Vocals 
Geidy Chapman - Lead Vocals
Aldo Alvarez - Lead Vocals 
Antonio Borrayo - Timbales
Hector Gomez - Conga, Bongo 
Andy Abad - Piano
Fabian Garcia Lopez - Bass 

Host: Albina Cabrera
Audio Engineer: Kevin Suggs & Julian Martlew
Guest Audio Engineer: Juan Alvarez
Mastering Engineer: Matt Ogaz

Cameras: Jim Beckmann, Carlos Cruz, Luke Knecht & Kendall Rock
Editor: Jim Beckmann

https://thebuenavistaorchestra.com
http://kexp.org

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3I2GFN_F8WudD_2jUZbojA/join
title: Jesus "Aguaje" Ramos and His Buena Vista Orchestra - Full Performance (Live on KEXP)
